text: Renegade Trail is a 1939 American Western film directed by Lesley Selander and written by John Rathmell and Harrison Jacobs. The film stars William Boyd, George "Gabby" Hayes, Russell Hayden, Charlotte Wynters, Russell Hopton, Roy Barcroft and John Merton. The film was released on August 18, 1939, by Paramount Pictures. ==Plot== == Cast == * William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy * George "Gabby" Hayes as Windy Halliday * Russell Hayden as Lucky Jenkins * Charlotte Wynters as Mary Joyce * Russell Hopton as Bob Smoky Joslin * Roy Barcroft as Stiff-Hat Bailey * John Merton as Henchman Tex Traynor * Sonny Bupp as Joey Joyce * Eddie Dean as Singing Cowhand Red * The King's Men as Singing Cowhands == References == == External links == * * * * Category:1939 films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Lesley Selander Category:Paramount Pictures films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:1939 Western (genre) films Category:Hopalong Cassidy films
title: Renegade Trail
